name: Bullet Hell Artistry #2: Unlikely Allies ~ Perfect Form
name_original: Bullet Hell Artistry #2: Unlikely Allies ~ Perfect Form
description:
This is my entry to the second edition of the Bullet Hell Artistry contest, hosted in Bullet Hell Engines.

The contest theme (that I came up with, incidentally) was to create a boss fight against two Touhou characters who are neither friends nor enemies. I chose Junko and Keiki Haniyasushin, two final bosses with two distinct takes on geometric danmaku (well, mostly just circles for the former).

Enjoy, and may you achieve crazy high scores.

CreditsZUN
